```{python}
import re
import os

os.chdir('/Users/tienly/Desktop/CCFRP_2021/')

with open('MiFish_RDB.txt', 'r' ) as f:
    content = f.read()
    # no extra column of genus_species
    content_new = re.sub('^(>[A-Za-z]+);([A-Za-z]+);([A-Za-z]+);([A-Za-z]+);([A-Za-z]+);([A-Za-z]+);([A-Za-z-]+);([A-Z]+)$', r'\1;\2;\3;\4;\5;\6;\7;\n\8', content, flags = re.M)

with open('MiFish_RDB.txt', 'w' ) as f:
  f.write(content_new)

print("need to delete the empty line at the end of file")
```
